headComponent.title: Thrive
headComponent.description: Find and join groups with people who share healthy goals like yours on our platform

editProfile.title: Account
editProfile.description: Update your account settings. Set your preferred language and timezone.

name.description: This is the name that will be displayed on your profile and in emails.

dateOfBirth.description: Your date of birth is used to calculate your age.

language.description: This is the language that will be used in the dashboard.
